Modules.Name: Help Module
Modules.Description: This module contains commands to assist the user in utilizing the bot.

Commands.Name: help
Commands.Description: Lists all the modules and their commands.

Commands.Name: syntax
Commands.Description: Shows the syntax for the specified command.

Modules.Name: Prefix Module
Modules.Description: This module allows users to set custom prefixes for their servers.

Commands.Name: addprefix
Commands.Description: Adds the specified prefix to the guild if it doesn't already exist.

Commands.Name: removeprefix
Commands.Description: Removes the specified prefix from the guild if it exists.

Commands.Name: clearprefixes
Commands.Description: Removes all the prefixes from the guild, other than the default. Restricted to administrators.

Modules.Name: Subscriptions Module
Modules.Description: This module allows users to configure services such as the Reddit service, so that it will post to their channel.

Commands.Name: cnnsubscribe
Commands.Description: Subscribes the current channel to breaking news from CNN.

Commands.Name: cnnunsubscribe
Commands.Description: Unsubscribes the current channel from breaking news from CNN.

Commands.Name: redditsubscribe
Commands.Description: Subscribes the current channel to the specified subreddit, and allows you to set the check interval. (minutes)

Commands.Name: redditunsubscribe
Commands.Description: Unsubscribes the current channel from the specified subreddit.

Commands.Name: subscriptions
Commands.Description: Displays all of the services the current channel is subscribed to.

Modules.Name: Stats Module
Modules.Description: This module contains commands that display process information, along with other statistics.

Commands.Name: invite
Commands.Description: Displays an invite for this bot.

Commands.Name: uptime
Commands.Description: Displays how long the bot has been running.

Commands.Name: ping
Commands.Description: Displays the latency between the bot and the Discord servers.

Commands.Name: stats
Commands.Description: Displays various statistics such as CPU, RAM, and HDD usage.

Commands.Name: speedtest
Commands.Description: Runs a fairly reliable speedtest.

Modules.Name: Tags Module
Modules.Description: This module contains the commands necessary to add/view/remove tags. Tags are channel specific.

Commands.Name: maketag
Commands.Description: Creates a tag with the specified name and content.

Commands.Name: tag
Commands.Description: Displays the specified tag if it exists.

Commands.Name: tags
Commands.Description: Displays all the tags on the current channel.

Commands.Name: deletetag
Commands.Description: Removes the specified tag from the channel.

Modules.Name: Voice Module
Modules.Description: This module contains various audio playback commands as well as commands for joining and leaving voice channels.

Commands.Name: joinvoice
Commands.Description: Joins the specified voice channel within the current guild, if one isn't specified it'll join the default.

Commands.Name: leavevoice
Commands.Description: Disconnects from the current voice channel within the current guild if in one.

Commands.Name: stopsound
Commands.Description: Stops the bot from streaming audio within the current guild, and advances the queue.

Commands.Name: skip
Commands.Description: Skips the the current audio and advances the queue.

Commands.Name: myinstant
Commands.Description: Allows you to search MyInstants and play a random clip through the bot's voice connection.

Commands.Name: playurl
Commands.Description: Attempts to download and play the specified url.

Commands.Name: playsc
Commands.Description: Attempts to download and play the specified SoundCloud song.

Commands.Name: playyt
Commands.Description: Attempts to download and play the specified YouTube video, if a playlist is supplied it will queue a few following songs.

Commands.Name: tts
Commands.Description: Downloads TTS over an external API and plays it through the bot's audio connection.

Commands.Name: record
Commands.Description: Records the specified user for the desired amount of time and plays it back.

Commands.Name: queue
Commands.Description: Displays the first few audio items that are queued.

Modules.Name: Admin Module
Modules.Description: This module contains several general administration commands, along with some owner-restricted commands.

Commands.Name: kick
Commands.Description: Displays the first few audio items that are queued.

Commands.Name: ban
Commands.Description: If permissions allow, the specified user will be banned from the guild.

Commands.Name: unban
Commands.Description: Unbans the specified user if they're banned and permissions allow so.

Commands.Name: addrole
Commands.Description: Adds the specified role to the player if they're not ranked higher and permissions allow.

Commands.Name: removeroll
Commands.Description: Removes the specified role from the user if they're not ranked higher and permissions allow.

Commands.Name: purgemessages
Commands.Description: Purges the specified number of messages from the current channel if permissions allow.

Commands.Name: reloadscripts
Commands.Description: Hotload External Scripts - 🚫 Restricted to Jeezy

Commands.Name: loadmodule
Commands.Description: Loades an unloaded Module - 🚫 Restricted to Jeezy.

Commands.Name: unloadmodule
Commands.Description: Unloads a previously loaded Module. 🚫 Retricted to Jeezy.

Modules.Name: Mashape Module
Modules.Description: This module contains commands that utilize the various Mashape APIs.

Commands.Name: yodaspeak
Commands.Description: Translates your text to yoda speak, it doesn't work very well.

Commands.Name: urbandefine
Commands.Description: Searches UrbanDictionary for your specified query, and then grabs a random result.

Modules.Name: Data Module
Modules.Description: This module contains commands that retrieve data either externally or from the database.

Commands.Name: guildinfo
Commands.Description: Retrieves some brief information about the current guild.

Commands.Name: weather
Commands.Description: Gets the weather forecast for the specified area.

Commands.Name: statustime
Commands.Description: Calculates the time the user has been their current status.

Commands.Name: userreactions
Commands.Description: Gets the top few reactions the specified player has received the most of.

Commands.Name: usergametime
Commands.Description: Gets the top few games the user plays the most.

Commands.Name: topgametime
Commands.Description: Gets the user's with he highest playtime for the specified game, including the total gametime altogether.

Modules.Name: Image Module
Modules.Description: This module contains commands that can retrieve and send images.

Commands.Name: randomdog
Commands.Description: Retrieves a random dog from some random API.

Commands.Name: imagesearch
Commands.Description: Searches Google Images for your specified query and returns a random result.

Commands.Name: webshot
Commands.Description: Takes a screenshot of the specified url and sends it to chat.

Modules.Name: Reminder Module
Modules.Description: This module contains commands for managing and creating reminders. Reminders are channel specific.

Commands.Name: remind
Commands.Description: Creates a reminder for the current channel that triggers after the desired interval. Example TimeSpan 00:05:00 = 5 minutes.

Commands.Name: cancelreminder
Commands.Description: Cancels the specified reminder if you own it.

Commands.Name: clearreminders
Commands.Description: Clears all of the reminders from the current channel unless one lacks permissions.

Modules.Name: Salutation Module
Modules.Description: This module contains commands for managing a guild's salutations, such as welcome messages.

Commands.Name: addwelcomemessage
Commands.Description: Adds a welcome message to the current guild if one does not already exist.

Commands.Name: removewelcomemessage
Commands.Description: Removes the welcome message from this service if one exists.

Commands.Name: addgoodbyemessage
Commands.Description: Adds a goodbye message to the current guild if one does not already exist.

Commands.Name: removegoodbyemessage
Commands.Description: Removes goodbye message from the currrent guild if one exists.

Modules.Name: Magick Module
Modules.Description: This module contains commands for distorting and/or manipulating existing images. If no image is specified, a previously embedded one will be used.

Commands.Name: noise
Commands.Description: Makes a gif out of applying noise to the specified image or a user.

Commands.Name: charcoal
Commands.Description: Applies a charcoal type effect to the specified image or a user and returns a gif.

Commands.Name: idk
Commands.Description: No description available.

Commands.Name: implode
Commands.Description: Implodes the specified image or a user and returns a gif.

Commands.Name: sharpen
Commands.Description: Applies swaying sharpen effects to the specified image, and return a gif.

Commands.Name: contrastfuzz
Commands.Description: Applies some weird contrast/fuzz effect to the image and makes a gif.

Commands.Name: happening
Commands.Description: Places the user's avatar or specified image on the it's happening meme where your image follows the head.

Commands.Name: oilpaint
Commands.Description: Applies a oil paint type effect to the specified user's avatar or image, makes a gif.

Commands.Name: wave
Commands.Description: Creates waves within the picture and makes a gif.

Commands.Name: blur
Commands.Description: Makes a gif by blurring the specified user's avatar or image by varying strengths.

Commands.Name: triggered
Commands.Description: Applies the user's avatar or the specified image to the triggered meme gif.
